attributes.action: Ban Metaldehyde as a slug killer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Metaldehyde is very harmfull to wildlife after the slugs have taken the bait, hedgehogs & birds often eat them which kills them too.

With the introduction of Ferric Phosphate pesticides which do not cause harm to wildlife but do kill the slugs effectively on the market it was high time that metaldehyde use was banned!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban Metaldehyde as a slug killer."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19799


Prime Minister's Office
